This is episode 06 of the One Bedroom House series, showing you how to draw a small house "From Start To Finish". My hope is that you will learn the fundamentals so that you can apply them to your own projects.

In this video, I will be showing how correctly place windows in your project. I hope that you learn something from today's video.

Thank you all for watching and sharing. 
Give it a like, and subscribe! Oh...drop a camment too!
